question: The author of Shivaratri Mahatyam:
explanation:
Srinatha was the court poet of Peda Komati Vema Reddi. The writings of Srinatha includes:
  • Palanati Charitra
  • Shivaratri Mahatyam
  • Shrungara Naishdham;
  • Shrungara bhushanam
  • Kalyanbhyudhyam;
  • Ragunathabhyudhyam;
  • Kalabhyudhyam
  • Salivahana Saptasati
